subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony and Chauncey Billups each had 18 points and Kenyon Martin added 16 to help the visiting Denver Nuggets beat the Boston Celtics, 94-85.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony and Chauncey Billups each had 18 points and Kenyon Martin added 16 to help the visiting Denver Nuggets beat the Boston Celtics, 94-85.
